sections.title: Getting Started
sections.content: GenAS helps you create and manage DoD Acquisition Strategy documents. Start by selecting a section from the document panel and use the AI Assistant to help generate content.

sections.title: Document Sections
sections.content: The main editor contains all required sections of your Acquisition Strategy. Click on any section to expand it and edit its content.

sections.title: AI Assistant
sections.content: Use the AI Assistant to help generate content for your document. Select a prompt template and customize it, or ask any questions about acquisition strategy development.

sections.title: Document Management
sections.content:
Use the buttons at the top of the document panel to:
- Save versions of your document
- Load previous versions
- Print your document

sections.title: Supporting Documents
sections.content: Upload and manage supporting documents like CDDs and ICDs in the upload panel. These documents will be used by the AI Assistant to generate relevant content.
